name: Circle Box
description:
Bubble Tangram Game is a block puzzle game with simple and addictive gameplay. Completely free with multiple unique levels.

The Rules of "Bubble Tangram Game" game are simple:

• Drag the round bubble blocks to move them.

• Your goal is to fit all round blocks into the frame.

• Bubbles can`t be rotated!

• Tap on bubble blocks to remove them from the frame.


"Bubble Tangram Game" Features:

• Thousands of unique levels & unique round blocks!
• Global Highscores to compare your bubble puzzle challenge skills with other players!
• No time pressure - Think as much, as you want!
• Very easy to play. Suitable for all ages!
• Family support!

Thanks for playing!
